## Component - <pr-svg-formatter>

###Purpose
To create a component that will be able to pull through properties set by the user and then output the properties as attributes. These attribute changes will then be seen on the svg

<b>Final Code</b>
```html
//HTML
<pr-svg url="/designer/screen3.svg" name="" position="12px,12px">
    <pr-svg-formatter fill="red" border="1px solid black" fill-condition="model.isActive == true"  border-condition="model.isActive == false" />
</pr-svg>

//PRODUCED HTML
<pr-svg url="/designer/screen3.svg" name="" position="" style="transform:translate(12px, 12px)">
    <svg style="fill:red; border: 1px solid black">
        <use href="/designer/screen3.svg"></use>
    </svg>
</pr-svg>
```

###Options

Find the parent element of the formatter using this.parentElement to apply the conditions and styling to.

<b>Conditions</b>

TBA


<b>Styling</b>

Use atributes to set styles on the svg
